member.name: M:EveComFramework.DroneControl.DroneControl.BestDrone(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the best inactive drone to attack a specific class target, in space or in the drone bay. Preference is given to drones in space.
member.param: Class of ship, such as "BattleShip", "Cruiser", or "Frigate"
member.returns: Drone that is best suited to attack that class. Drone may be in the bay
